FuncDef: The display ip routing-table ip-prefix command displays information about routes with a specified IP prefix list. The display ip routing-table ip-prefix command displays information about routes with a specified IP prefix list.
CLIs: display ip routing-table [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] ip-prefix <ip-prefix-name> [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the routing table of an IPv4 address family-enabled VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays information about routes with a specified IP prefix list.
The name is a string of 1 to 169 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays detailed information about active and inactive routes. If the parameter verbose is not specified, brief information about active routes is displayed.
-
